document_data.caption: A map showing Siiluth in southeast Evermeet.
document_data.name: Siiluth
document_data.mainbody: '''Siiluth''' was a natural bay found on the [[elven]] island homeland of [[Evermeet]].
document_data.Geography: Siiluth was found along Evermeet's southeastern shore along the [[Trackless Sea]]. It lay approximately {{SI|60|mi|k|long=yes}} northeast of [[Drelagara]].
document_data.Description: The beach bordering the bay was unique in that it was the only area of coast along the perimeter of the entire island that actually resembled a beach with sand, whereas the trees of the island abutted the shore everywhere else. The sands of the beach were pure white and had a fine texture.
document_data.History: Siiluth was where the elves constructed the majority of their sailing vessels.
